name: drive_children_insert
description: Inserts a file into a folder.

enforceSingleParent.description: Deprecated: Adding files to multiple folders is no longer supported. Use `shortcuts` instead.

supportsAllDrives.description: Whether the requesting application supports both My Drives and shared drives.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

ChildReference.description: A reference to a folder's child. Some resource methods (such as `children.get`) require a `childId`. Use the `children.list` method to retrieve the ID of the child.

childLink.description: Output only. A link to the child.

selfLink.description: Output only. A link back to this reference.

$block: A reference to a folder's child. Some resource methods (such as `children.get`) require a `childId`. Use the `children.list` method to retrieve the ID of the child.

$ul: **childLink**: Output only. A link to the child.
**kind**: Output only. This is always `drive#childReference`. (default: drive#childReference)
**selfLink**: Output only. A link back to this reference.
